meanings.definition: A genus of fungi that includes various plant pathogens.
meanings.sent1: The monilia fungi can harm plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to protect their crops from monilia infections.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monilia fungi played hide and seek in the flower beds.
meanings.sent4: The monilia spread through the plants like wildfire, causing devastation.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the monilia on the leaves was a warning sign of trouble ahead.

meanings.definition: A fungal infection caused by species of the genus Monilia.
meanings.sent1: She developed a monilia infection after working in the damp cellar.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed medication to treat the monilia infection.
meanings.sent3: The monilia infection turned her skin a bright shade of pink.
meanings.sent4: The monilia infection crept through her body like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The monilia infection made her feel weak and tired all the time.

meanings.definition: A type of yeast commonly found in the environment.
meanings.sent1: Monilia yeast can be found in soil and on fruits.
meanings.sent2: Bakers use monilia yeast to make bread rise.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monilia yeast caused the dough to overflow from the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the room, thanks to the monilia yeast.
meanings.sent5: The monilia yeast multiplied rapidly, creating bubbles in the dough.
